titles.title: O For A Heart To Praise My God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O for a heart to praise my God, newline A heart from sin set free, newline A heart that always feels thy blood newline So freely shed for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: A heart resigned, submissive, meek, newline My great Redeemer's throne, newline Where only Christ is heard to speak, newline Where Jesus reigns alone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: A humble, lowly, contrite heart, newline Believing, true, and clean, newline Which neither life nor death can part newline From Christ who dwells within.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: A heart in every thought renewed newline And full of love divine, newline Perfect and right and pure and good, newline A copy, Lord, of thine.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thy nature, gracious Lord, impart; newline Come quickly from above; newline Write thy new name upon my heart, newline Thy new, best name of Love.
